name: dynatrace
description: Dynatrace is cloud-native monitoring for highly dynamic container and cluster environments. Dynatrace allows you to better optimize your container deployments and memory allocations by using real-time usage data. Dynatrace is the only solution capable of automatically pinpointing application and infrastructure issues in seconds using artificial intelligence
postInstallNotes:
Dynatrace has been installed on DC/OS agents.
Log in to your Dynatrace account and monitor your DC/OS cluster. You will shorty see your cluster and container insights in Dynatrace.
postUninstallNotes: Dynatrace has been uninstalled from your DC/OS agents and will no longer run.
preInstallNotes:
This DC/OS Service is currently in preview.
Pass your Dynatrace OneAgent Download URL and number of DC/OS agent nodes as package options.
By default Marathon will allcoate 0.1 CPU and 400m memory per Dynatrace OneAgent task.
